virtualize.title: Virtualize
virtualize.description: Determines whether the component virtualizes out of view items or not.

viewport.title: Viewport ID
viewport.description: The HTML ID of the viewport used to determine which items to render

item-span.title: Item span
item-span.description: The space reserved for each item in the list in pixels

viewport-buffer.title: Viewport-buffer
viewport-buffer.description: The additional buffer space in pixels on either end of the viewport where items are also rendered.

layout-update-delay.title: Layout update delay
layout-update-delay.description: The duration in milliseconds the visible items in the list must be stable before the DOM is updated.  Defaults to 0.

auto-update-mode.title: Auto update mode
auto-update-mode.description: Defines when the component updates the visible items

start-region-span.title: Start regionspan
start-region-span.description: The span in pixels of the 'start' grid region for placing custom elements at the start of the list. Default is 0.

end-region-span.title: End regionspan
end-region-span.description: The span in pixels of the 'end' grid region for placing custom elements at the start of the list. Default is 0.

id.title: The ID of the data corresponding to a dictionary key

dataLocation.title: The location of the data using lodash path syntax
